text: geudaedeul jung-eseo jasin-ui anaedeul-ege ‘dangsin-eun nae eomeoniui deung-gwa gatso’ lago malhaneun jadeul, geunyeodeul(anae)eun geudeul-ui eomeoniga anila. geudeul-ui eomeonilan ojig geudeul-eul nah-eun yeoseong-il ppun-ila. jinsillo geudeul-eun binan bad-eul malgwa jojagdoen mal-eul hago issdoda. jinsillo hananimkkeseoneun gwan-yong-eul bepusigo neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-ila
